posts.post_title: Looking for Beater T206 HOF'ers and commons
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Korey
Building a poor college student set (Go Bucks!) and looking for a few very low grade HOF'ers...They can be ripped in half for all I care, I just like having the card.

I'm in need of most Hofer's EXCEPT matty white cap, cobb green port, jennings, chance yellow port, and Marquard port..anything else I need.

I'm also looking for beater commons as well.  

Feel free to email me.
